title: Machine-readable threat intelligence
extract: Machine-readable threat intelligence is a capability that allows SIEM and other security controls to make operational security decisions based on information about the prevailing threat landscape. Security leaders should understand how MRTI operates, and how it can be used to mitigate threats.
extract_html: Machine-readable threat intelligence is a capability that allows SIEM and other security controls to make operational security decisions based on information about the prevailing threat landscape. Security leaders should understand how MRTI operates, and how it can be used to mitigate threats.
